siteMetadata.name: Talha Enes Ayranci
siteMetadata.title: Talha Enes Ayranci
siteMetadata.description: PhD Candidate in Computer Science at the University of Glasgow.
siteMetadata.about:
I am a second-year PhD student in Computing Science at the University of Glasgow, under the supervision of Dr. Jonathan Grizou and Dr. Mireilla Bikanga Ada. My research focuses on educational robotics.
            
Apart from research, I like writing blogs, watching and playing football and exploring the beautiful places of Scotland. I also have a beginner's level interest in the philosophy of science.
siteMetadata.author: talhayranci

markdownRemark.excerpt: It is a project that aims to boot the Beaglebone Black device in a short time by using a personalized RT Linux kernel based operating system and an interfaceâ€¦
markdownRemark.html: It is a project that aims to boot the Beaglebone Black device in a short time by using a personalized RT Linux kernel based operating system and an interface created with QT. Buildroot was used to create the embedded system. It is intended to design an interface using QT and use it in the device with cross compilation.

frontmatter.title: HMI System
frontmatter.description: Graduation project for my undergraduate degree.
